title: Cell Fixation in Multiple 384-well Plates
author: Opentrons
description:
With this protocol, your robot can perform cell fixation in up to eight 384-well plates. The procedures are (1) removing all cell medium 50 uL/well from all plates, (2) washing cells using 50 uL PBS, (3) fixing cells using 50 uL paraformaldehyde in each well for 15 minutes, (4) removing paraformaldehyde solution and (5) wash cells with 50 uL PBS.

You will need:
 P300 Multi-channel Pipette
 12-row Troughs
 384-well Plates
 Opentrons 300 uL Tip Racks
process:
Input the number of the 384-well plates you will be using.
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
notes:
12-row Trough Setup:
 PBS: slot 2
 Paraformaldehyde: slot 3

markdown.title: Cell Fixation in Multiple 384-well Plates
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
With this protocol, your robot can perform cell fixation in up to eight 384-well plates. The procedures are (1) removing all cell medium 50 uL/well from all plates, (2) washing cells using 50 uL PBS, (3) fixing cells using 50 uL paraformaldehyde in each well for 15 minutes, (4) removing paraformaldehyde solution and (5) wash cells with 50 uL PBS.

---

You will need:
* P300 Multi-channel Pipette
* [12-row Troughs](https://www.usascientific.com/12-channel-automation-reservoir.aspx)
* 384-well Plates
* Opentrons 300 uL Tip Racks
markdown.process:
1. Input the number of the 384-well plates you will be using.
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
6. Hit "Run".
markdown.notes:
12-row Trough Setup:
* PBS: slot 2
* Paraformaldehyde: slot 3
